named-query.name: Averia.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: Averia.findNoFacturadasByDni
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where a.vehiculo.cliente.dni = ?1 and a.status = uo.ri.model.types.AveriaStatus.TERMINADA

named-query.name: Cliente.findByID
named-query.query: select c from Cliente c where c.id = ?1

named-query.name: Cliente.findByDni
named-query.query: select c from Cliente c where c.dni = ?1

named-query.name: MedioPago.findById
named-query.query: select mp from MedioPago mp where mp.cliente.id = ?1 order by mp.id asc

named-query.name: Tarjeta.findByNumber
named-query.query: select b from TarjetaCredito b where b.numero = ?1

named-query.name: Bono.findById
named-query.query: select b from Bono b where b.cliente.id = ?1

named-query.name: Bono.findByCode
named-query.query: select b from Bono b where b.codigo = ?1

named-query.name: Bono.resumenByClienteId
named-query.query: select c.dni, c.nombre, c.apellidos, count(b.id), sum(b.disponible), sum(b.acumulado) from Bono b join b.cliente c where b.cliente.id = ?1 group by c.dni, c.nombre, c.apellidos

named-query.name: Factura.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Factura f where f.numero = ?1

named-query.name: Mecanico.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mecanico m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Averia.findWithUnusedBono3ByClienteId
named-query.query: select a from Averia a join a.vehiculo v join v.cliente c where a.usadaBono = false and c.id = ?1
